definitions.title: n.pr.m.
definitions.body: Ahasuerus = Xerxes (Pers. Khshayârshâ = mighty + eye or man, vid. Spiegel:l. c. 216; in Aram. [[חשיארש]], CIS:II. i. 122 [B. C. 481]) king of Pers. Ezr 4:6, Es 1:1, Es 1:1, Es 1:2, Es 1:9, Es 1:10 + 18 t. Est + Es 10:1 Qr (Kt [[אחשׁרשׁ]]); [[אֲחַשְׁוֵרשׁ]] Es 1:16, Es 2:21, Es 3:12, Es 8:7, Es 8:10; also Da 9:1 where made father of ‘Darius the Mede,’ cf. Meinh.
